short.ar: muharir CSS almubashir. aktub CSS mkhssan li'ayi mawqie wib washahid altaghyirat fi alwaqt alfielii.
short.am: yek’et’ita sī’ēsi’ēsi ārita‘ī። lemaninyawimi diri t’abīya biju CSS yits’afu ina lewit’ochiwoni bek’its’ibeti yimeliketu።
short.bg: CSS редактор на живо. Напишете персонализиран CSS за всеки уебсайт и вижте промените си в реално време.
short.bn,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Customize any website with your own CSS and see your changes instantly with Amino!
short.ca: Editor CSS en directe. Escriu CSS personalitzat per a qualsevol lloc web i consulta els teus canvis en temps real.
short.cs: Live CSS Editor. Skriv tilpasset CSS til enhver hjemmeside og se dine ændringer i realtid.
short.da: Ζωντανός επεξεργαστής CSS. Γράψτε προσαρμοσμένο CSS για οποιονδήποτε ιστότοπο και δείτε τις αλλαγές σας σε πραγματικό χρόνο.
short.de: Live-CSS-Editor. Schreiben Sie benutzerdefiniertes CSS für jede Website und sehen Sie Ihre Änderungen in Echtzeit.
short.es,es_419: Editor de CSS en vivo. Escriba CSS personalizado para cualquier sitio web y vea sus cambios en tiempo real.
short.et: Reaalajas CSS-i redaktor. Kirjutage kohandatud CSS-i mis tahes veebisaidi jaoks ja vaadake oma muudatusi reaalajas.
short.fa: ویرایشگر CSS زنده. CSS سفارشی را برای هر وب سایتی بنویسید و تغییرات خود را در زمان واقعی مشاهده کنید.
short.fi: Live CSS-editori. Kirjoita mukautettu CSS mille tahansa verkkosivustolle ja näe muutokset reaaliajassa.
short.fil: Live na CSS Editor. Sumulat ng custom na CSS para sa anumang website at makita ang iyong mga pagbabago sa real time.
short.fr: Éditeur CSS en direct. Écrivez du CSS personnalisé pour n'importe quel site Web et visualisez vos modifications en temps réel.
short.gu: લાઈવ CSS એડિટર. કોઈપણ વેબસાઇટ માટે કસ્ટમ CSS લખો અને તમારા ફેરફારો રીઅલ ટાઇમમાં જુઓ.
short.he: עורך CSS חי. כתוב CSS מותאם אישית לכל אתר וראה את השינויים שלך בזמן אמת.
short.hi: लाइव सीएसएस संपादक। किसी भी वेबसाइट के लिए कस्टम सीएसएस लिखें और वास्तविक समय में अपने परिवर्तन देखें।
short.hr: CSS uređivač uživo. Napišite prilagođeni CSS za bilo koje web mjesto i pogledajte svoje promjene u stvarnom vremenu.
short.hu: Élő CSS szerkesztő. Írjon egyéni CSS-t bármely webhelyhez, és valós időben tekintse meg a változásokat.
short.id: Editor CSS langsung. Tulis CSS khusus untuk situs web apa pun dan lihat perubahan Anda secara real time.
short.it: Editor CSS in tempo reale. Scrivi CSS personalizzati per qualsiasi sito web e vedi le tue modifiche in tempo reale.
short.ja: ライブ CSS エディター。任意の Web サイト用のカスタム CSS を作成し、リアルタイムで変更を確認します。
short.kn: ಲೈವ್ CSS ಸಂಪಾದಕ. ಯಾವುದೇ ವೆಬ್‌ಸೈಟ್‌ಗಾಗಿ ಕಸ್ಟಮ್ CSS ಅನ್ನು ಬರೆಯಿರಿ ಮತ್ತು ನಿಮ್ಮ ಬದಲಾವಣೆಗಳನ್ನು ನೈಜ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ ನೋಡಿ.
short.ko: 라이브 CSS 편집기. 모든 웹사이트에 대한 맞춤형 CSS를 작성하고 실시간으로 변경 사항을 확인하십시오.
short.lt: Tiesioginis CSS redaktorius. Rašykite tinkintą CSS bet kuriai svetainei ir pamatykite pakeitimus realiuoju laiku.
short.lv: Tiešsaistes CSS redaktors. Rakstiet pielāgotu CSS jebkurai vietnei un skatiet izmaiņas reāllaikā.
short.ml: തത്സമയ CSS എഡിറ്റർ. ഏത് വെബ്‌സൈറ്റിനും ഇഷ്‌ടാനുസൃത CSS എഴുതുക, നിങ്ങളുടെ മാറ്റങ്ങൾ തത്സമയം കാണുക.
short.mr: थेट CSS संपादक. कोणत्याही वेबसाइटसाठी कस्टम CSS लिहा आणि रिअल टाइममध्ये तुमचे बदल पहा.
short.ms: Editor CSS Langsung. Tulis CSS tersuai untuk mana-mana tapak web dan lihat perubahan anda dalam masa nyata.
short.nl: Live CSS-editor. Schrijf aangepaste CSS voor elke website en bekijk uw wijzigingen in realtime.
short.no: Live CSS Editor. Skriv tilpasset CSS for alle nettsider og se endringene dine i sanntid.
short.pl: Edytor CSS na żywo. Napisz niestandardowy CSS dla dowolnej witryny i zobacz zmiany w czasie rzeczywistym.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Editor CSS ao vivo. Escreva CSS personalizado para qualquer site e veja suas alterações em tempo real.
short.ro: Editor CSS live. Scrieți CSS personalizat pentru orice site web și vedeți modificările dvs. în timp real.
short.ru: Живой редактор CSS. Напишите пользовательский CSS для любого веб-сайта и просматривайте свои изменения в режиме реального времени.
short.sk: Živý editor CSS. Napíšte vlastný CSS pre akúkoľvek webovú stránku a sledujte svoje zmeny v reálnom čase.
short.sl: Urejevalnik CSS v živo. Napišite CSS po meri za katero koli spletno stran in si oglejte svoje spremembe v realnem času.
short.sr: Живи ЦСС Едитор. Напишите прилагођени ЦСС за било коју веб локацију и видите своје промене у реалном времену.
short.sv: Live CSS Editor. Skriv anpassad CSS för vilken webbplats som helst och se dina ändringar i realtid.
short.sw: Live CSS Editor. Andika CSS maalum kwa tovuti yoyote na uone mabadiliko yako kwa wakati halisi.
short.ta: நேரடி CSS எடிட்டர். எந்தவொரு வலைத்தளத்திற்கும் தனிப்பயன் CSS ஐ எழுதி, உங்கள் மாற்றங்களை நிகழ்நேரத்தில் பார்க்கவும்.
short.te: ప్రత్యక్ష CSS ఎడిటర్. ఏదైనా వెబ్‌సైట్ కోసం అనుకూల CSSని వ్రాయండి మరియు మీ మార్పులను నిజ సమయంలో చూడండి.
short.th: ตัวแก้ไข CSS แบบสด เขียน CSS ที่กำหนดเองสำหรับเว็บไซต์ใด ๆ และดูการเปลี่ยนแปลงของคุณในแบบเรียลไทม์
short.tr: Canlı CSS Editörü. Herhangi bir web sitesi için özel CSS yazın ve değişikliklerinizi gerçek zamanlı olarak görün.
short.uk: Живий редактор CSS. Напишіть власний CSS для будь-якого веб-сайту та переглядайте свої зміни в реальному часі.
short.vi: Trình chỉnh sửa CSS trực tiếp. Viết CSS tùy chỉnh cho bất kỳ trang web nào và xem các thay đổi của bạn trong thời gian thực.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 라이브 CSS 편집기 Amino로 지속적인 사용자 스타일 시트를 작성하세요

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,es,es_419,et,fa,fi,fil:
Amino is a free browser extension that lets you to write and apply custom CSS to any website, allowing you to customize colors, fonts, page layout and more.

Your custom CSS is stored in the cloud and is loaded every time the page is viewed, allowing you to permanently customize your experience of any site you want. See your custom CSS in action on any desktop browser where Amino is installed. Turning it off is as easy as flipping a switch.

Amino helps you write CSS faster with autocomplete, and our inspect tool will help you easily locate the elements on the page you want to style. With our Live Edit mode, you can see your changes applied simultaneously as you compose CSS in the editor.

Our editor is packed with modern IDE features that make writing robust CSS or SCSS a breeze. Here's a full list of features that come with Amino:

→ Free cloud storage
→ Syntax highlighting
→ SCSS/Sass support
→ Autoupdate/Live Edit mode
→ Automatic indenting and outdenting
→ Inspect/scan tool to find selectors that you want to customize with CSS
→ Eyedropper and color picker tool
→ DevTools integration
→ Autocomplete/IntelliSense
→ Code formatting
→ Light/dark themes
→ Create collections
→ Manage/edit your CSS from anywhere at aminoeditor.com

•·················•·················•

Amino has been featured in: Chrome's ‘Top Picks’ in developer tool extensions, Smashing Magazine, Product Hunt, Designer News, Codrops, Sidebar, and elsewhere. Interested in writing about Amino? Send press inquiries to: info@aminoeditor.com.

For new feature announcements or just to say hello, please follow Amino on Twitter: https://twitter.com/aminoeditor

For frequently asked questions visit:
https://aminoeditor.com/faqs

Have a different kind of question? Send us a message at:
support@aminoeditor.com

For documentation and guides on how to get the most out of Amino: 
https://docs.aminoeditor.com

For Amino's open source projects:
https://github.com/aminoeditor

By installing the extension or accessing aminoeditor.com, you agree to Amino’s Privacy Policy (https://aminoeditor.com/privacy) and Terms of Use (https://aminoeditor.com/terms). TLDR: We care about user privacy. We will never sell your data.

To learn about the permissions this extension requests:
https://aminoeditor.com/permissions

Amino's keyboard shortcuts:
Open browser popup: CTRL+SHIFT+SPACE
Open remote popup: ALT+SHIFT+SPACE
(These can be modified at this URL: chrome://extensions/shortcuts)

•·················•·················•

Thanks for giving Amino a try. If you like our product, please consider leaving us a review.

Sincerely,
Team Amino
Eric Uldall (github.com/ericuldall)
Timothy Long (github.com/timothylong)

Happy tinkering!
φ(．．)
long.am,bn,en_GB,en_US,hr,kn,ml,sw,ta,te,zh_C:
- Customize websites with CSS by creating your own user style sheets. Customize page appearance, fix rendering bugs, make the web what you want it to be.
- Enjoy modern IDE features in the browser.
- Save and sync custom styles to your Google Account. Access them from multiple computers.
- Export your data on demand.

Featured in: Chrome's ‘Top Picks’ in developer tool extensions, Smashing Magazine, Product Hunt, Designer News, Codrops, Sidebar, and more.


FEATURES
- Syntax highlighting
- Automatic indenting and outdenting
- Inspect tool
- DevTools integration (*new*)
- SCSS/Sass support
- Autocomplete
- Autosave
- Synced data with Chrome sync
- Copy to clipboard
- Data export
- Dark theme


KEYBOARD SHORTCUTS
Open browser popup: CTRL+SHIFT+SPACE
Open remote popup: ALT+SHIFT+SPACE


GET IN TOUCH
aminoeditor@gmail.com
twitter.com/aminoeditor


HELP & SUGGESTIONS
If you have feedback or would like to report an issue, you can do so on the Google Group page: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/aminoeditor


ABOUT PERMISSIONS
To learn about the permissions this extension requests:
https://docs.aminoeditor.com/legal/permissions (TLDR: We're not doing anything nefarious or creepy.)


TERMS OF USE AND PRIVACY
By installing the extension, you agree to its Terms of Use (https://docs.aminoeditor.com/legal/terms-of-use) and Privacy Policy (https://docs.aminoeditor.com/legal/privacy-policy).


AUTHORS

github.com/ericuldall

github.com/timothylong


Happy tinkering. 🔧😉
long.el,en,en_AU:
Amino is a free CSS editor that lets you write and apply persistent CSS to any website. Use Amino to experiment with CSS in realtime, style your favorite websites, fix rendering issues—the applications are endless. Your CSS is stored in the cloud and is served every time you visit the page, making it effectively permanent as long as the extension is enabled.

Note to new users:
To use either the free or paid version of Amino, a signup is required as it includes cloud storage functionality. We have the utmost respect of the privacy of our users, but if you prefer a fully local or anonymous solution, we would suggest trying an extension like Magic CSS.

Amino has previously been featured in: Chrome's ‘Top Picks’ in developer tool extensions, Smashing Magazine, Product Hunt, Designer News, Codrops, Sidebar, and more.

FEATURES
- Syntax highlighting
- Automatic indenting and outdenting
- Inspect tool
- DevTools integration (*new*)
- SCSS/Sass support
- Autocomplete
- Autosave
- Data export
- Multiple color schemes

•·················•·················•

For new feature announcements or just to say hello, please follow Amino on X: https://x.com/aminoeditor

For frequently asked questions visit:
https://aminoeditor.com/faqs

Have a different kind of question? Send us a message at:
support@aminoeditor.com

For documentation and guides on how to get the most out of Amino: 
https://docs.aminoeditor.com

For Amino's open source projects:
https://github.com/aminoeditor

By installing the extension or accessing aminoeditor.com, you agree to Amino’s Privacy Policy (https://aminoeditor.com/privacy) and Terms of Use (https://aminoeditor.com/terms). TLDR: We care about user privacy, and we will never sell your data.

To learn about the permissions this extension requests:
https://aminoeditor.com/permissions

Amino's keyboard shortcuts:
Open browser popup: CTRL+SHIFT+SPACE
Open remote popup: ALT+SHIFT+SPACE
(These can be modified at this URL: chrome://extensions/shortcuts)

•·················•·················•

Thanks for giving Amino a try. If you like our product, please consider leaving us a review.

long.it:
- Customize websites with CSS by creating your own user style sheets. Customize page appearance, fix rendering bugs, make the web what you want it to be.
- Enjoy modern IDE features in the browser.
- Sync your custom style sheets to the cloud. Access them from any desktop device where you are signed into your Google account on Chrome.
- Use our selector tool to inspect pages and visually find elements that you want to customize.
- Export your work at any time.

Featured in: Chrome's ‘Top Picks’ in developer tool extensions, Smashing Magazine, Product Hunt, Designer News, Codrops, Sidebar, and more.
